name: The Nutshack: The Game
summary: The Nutshack: The Game is a free game developed by Lame Dimension based on a 2006 Filipino American adult cartoon aired on Myx TV called The Nutshack. The game features Phil Matibag and his uncle Tito Dick "Dickman" as playable characters in a classic platforming adventure to embark on a mission on finding out where the rest of the Nutshack crew has disappeared to.
